http://www.iflscience.com/space/visualizing-13-billion-years-cosmic-evolution

Just found this, it's so amazing what we can simulate with computers these days, just can't wait for quantum computing.

I felt such wonder as to almost weep: I am excited to study physics in college!

-Duxwing
The similarities to our own universe argues for how much we really know about how the universe works. Truly magnificent.

I felt such wonder as to almost weep: I am excited to study physics in college!

-Duxwing

Future aerospace engineer here. I'm more interested in how we'll get there.

-Astropapi1
